ch4_conclusion.speaker: Narrator
ch4_conclusion.text: Captain Vera has found her way back from the storm. Her courage, once lost to grief and guilt, has returned stronger than ever.

ch4_summary.speaker: Narrator
ch4_summary.text: Word of the cafe spreads. A place where even the most weathered souls can find renewal. New visitors begin to arrive, drawn by stories of warmth and acceptance.

ch4_hint.speaker: Narrator
ch4_hint.text: Among them, whispers of a mysterious masked visitor who seeks a place where they can be... themselves.

ch4_end.speaker: Narrator
ch4_end.text:
Chapter 4 Complete: The Captain Docks

Vera has found peace with her past and a new home at Dragon Haven. The sea no longer haunts her dreams.
